edu.ucla.wise.commons

Class QuestionBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.wise.commons.PageItem
      • edu.ucla.wise.commons.QuestionBlock
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    QuestionBlockforSubjectSet

    public class QuestionBlock
extends PageItem
    This class is a subclass of PageItem and represents a question block on the page.
